item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 12, 2024 at 6:25 AM UTC
item.description:
1. A ChatGPT clone, in 3000 bytes of C, backed by GPT-2 (2023) (65 points | 8 comments)
2. FCC opens entire 6 GHz band to low power device operations (542 points | 186 comments)
3. Mysterious New Jersey drone sightings prompt call for 'state of emergency' (269 points | 420 comments)
4. Gemini 2.0: our new AI model for the agentic era (692 points | 357 comments)
5. Ham Radio All-in-One-Cable (93 points | 15 comments)
6. The Cold Email Handbook (158 points | 69 comments)
7. QEMU with VirtIO GPU Vulkan Support (159 points | 31 comments)
8. Review of Mullvad VPN (294 points | 93 comments)
9. PeerTube mobile app: discover videos while caring for your attention (348 points | 127 comments)
10. Tricking c64 basic into clearing a hi-res screen quickly (21 points | 4 comments)
11. OnlyFans models are using AI impersonators to keep up with their DMs (196 points | 225 comments)
12. Deciphering C++ compiler errors: Nonsensical errors from a function declaration (12 points | 5 comments)
13. WXT: Next-Gen Web Extension Framework (11 points | 1 comment)
14. Instant macOS install on Proxmox including AMD patches (120 points | 40 comments)
15. Reachability Analysis of DNS (5 points | discuss)
16. Launch HN: Azalea Robotics (YC S24) – Baggage-handling robots for airports (97 points | 60 comments)
17. Pgroll – Zero-downtime, reversible, schema changes for PostgreSQL (new website) (194 points | 34 comments)
18. 2400 phone providers may be shut down by the FCC for failing to stop robocalls (295 points | 174 comments)
19. A letter to open-source maintainers (107 points | 23 comments)
20. The GPU is not always faster (132 points | 70 comments)
21. Evolving my ergonomic setup (or, my laptop with extra steps) (127 points | 63 comments)
22. RISC-V HiFive Premier P550 Development Boards with Ubuntu Now Available (136 points | 71 comments)
23. The Myth of Bananaland (121 points | 88 comments)
24. Dioxus 0.6 – Crossplatform apps with Rust (213 points | 87 comments)
25. Majora's Mask decompilation project reaches 100% completion (30 points | 1 comment)
26. Django and Postgres for the Busy Rails Developer (147 points | 78 comments)
27. Chatbot hinted a kid should kill his parents over screen time limits: lawsuit (239 points | 315 comments)
28. Dear OAuth Providers (199 points | 43 comments)
29. Storing Times for Human Events (96 points | 39 comments)
30. Unix Review Magazine Interviews Larry Tesler (37 points | 5 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 12, 2024 at 6:25 AM UTC
